mapper.select:
select
from command_store where containerId=#{containerId} and type='1' order by id desc limit 1

select
from command_store where containerId=#{containerId} and type='1' and command='remoteSwiMac' order by id desc limit 1

select
from command_store where containerId=#{containerId} and type='1' and command='refRunMode' order by id desc limit 1

select
from command_store where containerId=#{value1} and longTime >#{value2} and command='remoteSwiMac' order by id desc limit 1
SELECT * FROM command_store WHERE command = #{command} AND containerId = #{containerId} AND type='1' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert:
insert into command_store
id,
content,
userName,
time,
longTime,
type,
command,
containerId,
status,
value,
display,

mapper.update:
update command_store
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longTime = #{longTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
containerId = #{containerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
display = #{display,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM command_store WHERE longTime BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} AND containerId IN (SELECT containerId FROM container WHERE companyId = #{companyId}) ORDER BY longTime DESC
